errors.fix: Check for missing semicolons, braces, or keywords.
Declare prototype or define the function; link libraries.
Check array bounds, null pointers, uninitialized vars.
Cast explicitly or use correct types.
Check if pointer is null before use.
Include correct headers or check paths.

errors.simple: Code invokes undefined behavior (e.g., signed overflow).
errors.fix: Avoid undefined actions; use unsigned types for overflow.
